item.title: Case trouble... EDIT: Nevermind, fixed :P
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

You put it in the wrong spot, put it with your second clicks. If you don’t know how to find this… Press ctrl+f and search case 823 which is a dummy case, add it below that case.

Read full topic

item.title: Case trouble... EDIT: Nevermind, fixed :P
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ok, I added a Chaos Altar on entrana, and I added a case so that when you pray at it, it gives you prayer exp. But for some reason, it does nothing… Here’s the case I put in:

case 411: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You pray to Zamorak and he blesses you."); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(645); //326 addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[5]), 5); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Anyone see anything wrong with it?

EDIT: Nevermind, I figured out that you can only pray on 1 side of the altar lol…

Read full topic
